puzzle.help: 1. Fill the board like a Sudoku. 2. If the difference between two adjacent numbers is 1 (1 and 2, 2 and 3, 3 and 4, etc) there will be a sign between them. 3. If the sign is between two tiles on the same row: 4. The plus sign means the tile on the right will be [number on the left] + 1. 5. The minus sign means the tile on the right will be [number on the left] - 1. 6. If the sign is between two tiles on the same column: 7. The plus sign means the tile on the bottom will be [number on the top] + 1. 8. The minus sign means the tile on the bottom will be [number on the top] - 1.
